title: Problem with league resolution
body: I would like some assistance with what is wrong with my resolution and quality on league of legends, I have recently bought a new laptop and it seems as if multiple apps are interacting oddly with the graphics card. It appears to be up to date but as the 1920X1080 resolution has some problems both in the client and in game, the minimap in game has extremely small icons and the client itself seems to be in a lower resolution than normal, I have tried running without the DSi  but it does not resolve the issue. Any idea whats wrong response would be nice it is difficult to know whats wrong with my laptop at the moment when playing this particular game.

replies.body:
Display issues can be caused by a number of different factors, but problematic graphics are the most likely cause here. I recommend working through the steps inside our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a first step to resolving this.

Let me know if this issue persists through those settings.

I tried all the things you have suggested in the forum but the issue was not resolved, my computer utilizes the Nvidia m2000m graphics card when in game but when the client is launched it has scaling issues I can't seem to post the image here but this is a problem because when I disable the dsi the quality of the picture will go up but the sizing will be incorrect and cause a black border to appear around the client. For the in game the map has terribly small icons and makes it near impossible to read also everything is scaled oddly. All my drivers are up to date but I can't understand why the game refuses to scale correctly. everything is set to 1920*1080.

Gotcha, thanks for giving me that additional context. I think at this point, we'll want to dive into some system logs to troubleshoot this further. I suggest creating a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can follow up on this.

If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will expedite your service. Let me know if you have any questions.

Are you sure your screen is 1080p? I had similar issues with my new laptop which has a 4K screen, and had to set my Windows resolution down to 1080p to be able to see my icons and pointer. Even when the game was set to 1920x1080, having a different default resolution in the OS causes problems.
